name: Dice Golf (personion)
description:
Roll the die and play golf!

Instructions:

  • Click and drag to lauch the die, but whenever it stops, something random happens.
  • Every time you get the die into the hole, you get one point.
  • if your amount of lives goes to 0, (showed in the die in the top left) the amount of points goes to 0 as well.

Faces of the die:

  • ROLLING
    • The die is currently "rolling" and no actions have been picked
    • The icon is a question mark
  • CONTINUE
    • Nothing happens; you can launch the die again.
    • The icon is two arrows
  • HEART
    • You get one extra life
    • The icon is a heart
  • NEGATIVE HEART
    • You lose a life
    • The icon is a heart with a horizontal line through it
  • LAUNCH
    • The die gets launched in the direction it is facing
    • The icon is an arrow
